partnership.title: Development Partnership Program
partnership.subtitle: Join the future of educational technology

hero.title: Development
hero.description: Join a select group of forward-thinking institutions shaping the future of educational technology. Co-create FabriiQ while gaining competitive advantage.

coCreators.title: Co-Creators,
coCreators.description: We don't want users who accept what we build - we want partners who help us build what education truly needs. Every development partner directly influences our product roadmap, receives custom branding integration, and validates solutions in real educational environments.

journey.title: Partnership
journey.description: Interactive timeline showing your path from invitation to sustained partnership

header.title: Co-Creation Partnership
header.description: Complete partnership compatibility assessment to begin strategic evaluation process

form.title: Partnership Co-Creation Assessment
form.subtitle: Help us understand your institution's vision and co-development readiness

placeholders.currentSystems: Describe your current educational technology systems, operational challenges, and strategic digital transformation goals...
placeholders.customRequirements: Describe your institution's specific needs, branding requirements, and vision for educational technology innovation...

commitment.evaluation: Evaluation Partnership (Assessment phase with potential expansion)

form.disclaimer: By submitting, you express interest in strategic co-development partnership and agree to participate in mutual evaluation process for Alpha phase collaboration.

success.title: Partnership Assessment Submitted!
success.message: We've received your comprehensive partnership assessment. Our development team will review your submission and contact you within 48 hours to discuss strategic compatibility and next steps.

discovery.title: Invitation & Discovery
discovery.description: Institutional needs assessment and strategic compatibility evaluation

selection.title: Mutual Selection
selection.description: Partnership Charter signing and resource commitment formalization

pilot.title: Pilot Implementation
pilot.description: Core system deployment with dedicated support and custom branding integration

partnership.title: Full Partnership
partnership.description: Complete platform access with co-development rights and workflow customization

sustained.title: Beyond Alpha - Sustained Partnership
sustained.description: Preferential terms, continued innovation access, and legacy recognition as founding partner

investment.title: Balanced
investment.description: A strategic partnership where both institutions and FabriiQ invest meaningfully for mutual success

institutions.title: For Educational Institutions
institutions.subtitle: Strategic investment in deployment and expertise sharing

benefits.custom_features: Custom feature development aligned with institutional workflows

competitive_advantage.title: Competitive advantage over market alternatives
competitive_advantage.description: Gain strategic market positioning through early access to cutting-edge educational technology solutions.

benefits.influence_roadmap: Direct influence on product roadmap and development priorities
benefits.custom_branding: Custom branding and institutional identity integration
benefits.thought_leadership: Thought leadership recognition in educational technology innovation
benefits.preferential_pricing: Preferential post-Alpha pricing and sustained partnership terms

fabriiq.title: For FabriiQ Development
fabriiq.subtitle: Investment in dedicated co-development resources and priority support

benefits.validation: Real-world validation in authentic educational environments
benefits.user_input: User-centered design input from actual educators and administrators
benefits.quality_assurance: Quality assurance through comprehensive multi-institutional testing
benefits.use_case_refinement: Use case refinement and workflow optimization insights
benefits.market_validation: Market validation and proof of concept development
benefits.success_stories: Success story documentation and case study creation

idealPartner.title: Ideal
idealPartner.description: We seek institutions ready for strategic co-development partnership

items.multi_campus: Multi-campus educational organizations with complex operational needs
items.progressive_leadership: Progressive leadership committed to comprehensive digital transformation
items.technology_readiness: Technology readiness with dedicated IT resources and implementation capacity
items.collaborative_culture: Collaborative culture willing to participate in iterative co-development
items.financial_readiness: Financial readiness to invest in deployment and infrastructure costs

items.csuite_commitment: C-suite commitment to platform adoption and organizational change management
items.staff_allocation: Dedicated staff allocation (10-15 hours monthly) for co-development participation
items.investment_deployment: Investment in deployment costs, training, and infrastructure requirements
items.reference_willingness: Willingness to serve as reference and thought leadership case study
items.research_participation: Participation in user research, feedback sessions, and product validation

items.cover_deployment: Cover deployment, infrastructure, and training investment
items.allocate_staff: Allocate dedicated staff time for partnership activities
items.participate_feedback: Participate in monthly feedback sessions and quarterly strategy workshops
items.provide_assessment: Provide honest assessment and constructive development guidance
items.maintain_confidentiality: Maintain confidentiality regarding Alpha features and development roadmap

items.provide_access: Provide dedicated Alpha co-development access and priority feature development
items.deliver_branding: Deliver custom branding integration and workflow personalization
items.maintain_communication: Maintain transparent communication about development progress and timelines
items.honor_terms: Honor preferential post-Alpha partnership terms and pricing
items.recognize_institution: Recognize your institution as founding development partner with thought leadership opportunities

beyondAlpha.title: Beyond Alpha:
beyondAlpha.description: The Alpha Development Partnership establishes the foundation for long-term strategic advantage

preferential_terms.title: Preferential Partnership Terms
preferential_terms.description: Founding partners retain advantageous pricing and priority access compared to future adopters

innovation_leadership.title: Continued Innovation Leadership
innovation_leadership.description: First access to new features, platform enhancements, and strategic developments

legacy_advantage.title: Legacy Advantage
legacy_advantage.description: Your institutional workflows and branding remain deeply integrated in platform evolution

thought_leadership.title: Thought Leadership Recognition
thought_leadership.description: Showcased as founding contributor to educational technology transformation

intelligence.title: Educational Intelligence Platform
